name: extract
description: Extract the data of a compressed file.

params.name: format
params.description: The format of the compressed file.

params.name: source
params.description: Path (relative or absolute) to the source-file or a directory with zip-files.

params.name: target
params.description: Path (relative or absolute) to the the directory, where you want to extract the data.

examples.title: Extract a zip-file
examples.description: Extract a zip-file and save the data in the "output-directory".

examples.title: Extract a multiple zip-files via a directory
examples.description: Extract all zip-files, which are stored in the "multiple-directory" and save the data in the "output-directory".
